title: STIGMA
description: VBOT services are delivered virtually, offering privacy and anonymity to individuals seeking treatment.

title: ACCESS
description: VBOT’s software allows patients to schedule their appointments with their care team at their convenience.

title: FINANCIAL
description: VBOT files insurance on behalf of their patients, and for those without coverage, hardship grants are offered.

title: SOCIAL DETERMINANTS OF HEALTH (SDOH)
description: VBOT’s software is designed to enable patients’ care team members to create referrals to relevant social service networks.

title: TRAUMA
description: VBOT’s care team members provide patients access to healthcare professionals trained to evaluate behavioral health conditions resulting from traumatic events.

title: JUSTICE
description: VBOT’s technology facilitates virtual treatment for individuals both during incarceration and upon release. VBOT care teams also participate in treating individuals in early release and jail diversion programs.
